Who: Lord Elder
Location: The Ark - Command center

Lord Elder stalked thro=
ugh the halls of the Ark, which is what he did
when he needed to think. The=
re was something going on here and he
needed to get to the bottom of it bef=
ore it was too late.

He was on his way back to the command center when a c=
all came in to him . . .

> "Lord Elder, we're here, but we dunno what's go=
'n down with Tucson Prime. Cyclonus asked 'em a question and I thought for =
sure he was gonna go after him with a vengeance. But he didn't. He's right =
here, in some sorta trance like state. Hope those creepoids didn't get insi=
de his directory. Quickstride, how is he?"
>
> Quickstride shrugs.
>
> " No=
thn' yet Rat Trap, he's in deep thought. Sir, we dunno what ta make of this=
, we never saw anything like this before. Got any idea what's going on?"
>
=
> They look to the video com link device on Rat Trap's arm as they wait for=
 an answer.

Elder looked at Rat Trap and Quickstride through the comlink, =
taking a
moment to comprehend just what he was hearing. Finally he shook hi=
s
head, "I doubt that he has been taken over."

Elder shrugged slightly, fe=
eling every bit uneasy about events, and
very much out of his depth, "There=
 are very few who could take over a
Prime." he said confidently, although h=
e could think of a few, one of
the insecticons for one. He was certainly gl=
ad those guys weren't
around.

"If you guys are where I think you are, then=
 you need to get Tuscon
out of there. You guys are an easy target with Tusc=
on frozen like
that. How come you guys didn't just storm the fortress . . .=
 "

Elder peered into the scene behind Rat Trap and Quickstride, "Ahhhh,
Hy=
dras has sank he base."

Elder thought for a moment, "Legacy and I had been=
 experimenting with
explosive depth charges to counter that." Elder rubbed =
his chin
thoughtfully, "If you can create a breach in Hydras' walls from th=
e
outside while it is submerged, I don't think even he would like all
that =
hot magma running into his base."

Elder shrugged, "We never got a chance t=
o test it, and we weren't sure
if it would work anyways." He glanced over a=
t Tuscon through Rat
Trap's video feed, sadness on his face, "It's too bad =
you don't have
any explosive charges with you . . . "

(TAG)

Preston
